Graduate student in Psychology
August 10, 2016, Stephen was senior to Rashmi but didn’t manage directly

Rashmi is a talented, conscientious quality engineer.  I really enjoyed working with Rashmi to help her automate the functional testing of a challenging web frontend with Selenium 2 using the Page Object design pattern.  Not only did we get to enhance the company-wide test framework to support a wide breadth of testing, Rashmi and team automated the process of recording the status of each test run in JIRA to support reporting and management functions.

summary: I founded and lead QualiMente, which guides Tech teams to migrate to the AWS Cloud securely and at scale.  QualiMente provides simple, secure, and robust infrastructure designs, modern development processes, and proven code to your team and helps you learn and adopt the new way of building and operating infrastructure.
name: Stephen Kuenzli
title: Guiding Tech teams to AWS securely and at scale.
